title: Strengthening Educational Competencies Through Experiential Learning-Based International Practicum Program (PPL) Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Strengthening educational practicum competencies through experiential learning in multicultural settings, with flexible learning experiences via mobile device-based microlearning.

learning_goals: Learners improve teaching skills by over 80% through practical experiences in overseas educational settings applying experiential learning models
Learners complete digital portfolios reflecting 100% of weekly practical content using mobile microlearning platforms
Learners enhance self-assessment skills by completing over 90% of reflective journals during practical processes through formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
